title: Drawing, "Design for a Vegetable Dish", 1943
medium: Pen and black ink, red ink, reddish-brown crayon, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black, at center right: 129
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, center: LEGUMBERA (CON ASA AMOVIBLE) [vegetable dish with removable handle]/DIAMETRE 20 cms/ANSE 8 cms 1/2 HAUTEUR 10 cms; lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/43.; above handle: (an arrow pointing left, downward) MADERA; in graphite to right of knob: 15 vis(?).
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Round vegetable dish drawn in plan and elevation. Cover and sauce pan with a scalloped rim. The cover surmounted by a knob sitting in scalloped plate. The knob and handle comprised of circular rings. The handle in red ink and brown crayon to be executed in madera. Underdrawing in graphite of vegetable dish in golden section.
